name: The Factory (itch) (Lin)
description:
The Factory is a 2D Platformer where you play as a robot to test the modern guns on your enemies in experiments.

Don't panic when you see a file/document named "Save.sav" it's the save file.

The game won't recieve good updates ,because there is an error where I can't make more than 5 levels. Sorry! But I will post bug fixes.

The game was created with GameMaker Studio 2.
